confirmDelete.message: Are you sure you want to delete {modelName}?

confirmDelete.title: Confirm Delete
confirmDelete.message: Are you sure you want to delete {filename}?

validation.invalidFormat: Invalid format: Use only alphanumeric characters. May include spaces, underscores, hyphens, or periods, but not consecutive periods.

validation.keysMismatch: Encryption key and confirmation does not match!
validation.enterName: Please enter a name (this will also be used as the filename)

encryptedContentDialog.title: Encrypted Content
encryptedContentDialog.message: This chat contains encrypted content. Please provide the key to decrypt.

warningDialog.title: Warning
warningDialog.message: There are unsaved messages in the current chat window - they will be lost. Proceed?

confirmSessionResetDialog.title: Confirm Session Reset
confirmSessionResetDialog.message: Are you sure you want to clear all chat messages?

loadChatSessionDialog.title: Load Chat Session
loadChatSessionDialog.message:
Are you sure you want to load chat session: 

{sessionName}?

This will clear all current messages and if unsaved, will be lost.

updateChatSessionDialog.title: Update Chat Session
updateChatSessionDialog.provideKey:: Chat session is encrypted. You must provide the encryption key to update.
updateChatSessionDialog.chatUpdateFail: Unable to save encrypted chat session: {sessionName}
updateChatSessionDialog.incorrectKey: Incorrect encryption key. Unable to update chat session.

advancedPrompt.title: Advanced Prompt Options
advancedPrompt.scrollMessage: Scroll to see more tuning options
advancedPrompt.tempDesc: Controls the randomness of the output.
advancedPrompt.tempMeans: Use lower temperatures (e.g., 0.2) for tasks that require precision and predictable outcomes, such as technical writing or code generation. Use higher temperatures (e.g., 1.5) for more open-ended tasks like creative writing or brainstorming.
advancedPrompt.probDesc: Determines the diversity of the response.
advancedPrompt.probMeans: Lower values (e.g., 0.3) result in more focused and predictable outputs by limiting the model to a smaller subset of the most probable tokens. Higher values (e.g., 0.9) allow for a wider variety of tokens, producing more creative and less predictable responses.
advancedPrompt.tokensDesc: Sets the maximum number of tokens that the model will generate in the response.
advancedPrompt.tokensMeans: Limits response length. Use lower values for concise answers and higher values for detailed responses.
advancedPrompt.systemDesc: Initial instruction that sets the context or role for the entire conversation.
advancedPrompt.systemMeans: By setting the model\'s role or focus, such as acting as a helpful assistant, technical expert, or creative writer, it aligns the model\'s responses to user expectations and the intended application
advancedPrompt.stopDesc: Enter multiple sequences separated by commas.
advancedPrompt.stopMeans: Define where the response should end to prevent overly lengthy or unnecessary outputs. (example: .,\\n, user:)
advancedPrompt.unsavedChangesMessage: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to exit?

appSettings.title: Application Settings
appSettings.overridePath: Override app data path (leave blank for system default)

unsavedChanges.title: Unsaved Changes
unsavedChanges.message: You have unsaved changes. Do you want to save them?

providerSetup.title: AI/LLM Provider Required
providerSetup.message: ConfiChat needs a configured AI provider to function. Please set up one of the following providers:
providerSetup.noModelSelectedMessage: Select a model from your configured AI provider to continue. If no models appear in the top bar, verify your provider settings.
